title: Employing people who are carers: advice and training

heading_context: Employing people who are carers: advice and training
chunks.html_content: Advice and training for employers with employees who are carers.
chunks.plain_content:
Employing people who are carers: advice and training
Advice and training for employers with employees who are carers.

heading_context: Employing people who are carers: advice and training
chunks.html_content:
Employers for Carers

Find out about call charges
chunks.plain_content:
Employing people who are carers: advice and training
Employers for Carers 
www.employersforcarers.org

Telephone: 020 7378 4956

heading_context: Employing people who are carers: advice and training
chunks.html_content:
You can get advice about:

  • identifying carers in the workplace
  • managing staff carer networks
  • directing staff to other sources of support outside the workplace
  • practical solutions to combining work and care

You can get training to help you with:

  • employment law
  • carers rights
  • flexible working
  • managing stress
chunks.plain_content:
Employing people who are carers: advice and training
You can get advice about:

  identifying carers in the workplace
  managing staff carer networks
  directing staff to other sources of support outside the workplace
  practical solutions to combining work and care

You can get training to help you with:

  employment law
  carers rights
  flexible working
  managing stress
